title: Nancy Eagleson /// Another Victim /// 608
description:
Nancy Eagleson /// Another Victim /// 608

Part 2 of 4

 

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

On Sunday, November 13, 1960 - Nancy Eagleson was abducted while walking home. She was just a few houses away from her own when a man wearing glasses and driving a dark car pulled up alongside of her and asked if she would like a ride. Just seconds later the car was gone and so was Nancy.  The Sheriff was looking for a suspect. There was a manhunt in northwest Ohio and they found their first suspect in Indiana. But unfortunately there was another victim. Today we continue to examine Nancy’s case and explore the unsolved murder of Gloria Kowalewicz. 

Beer of the Week - Big Sky Daddy by Hoy Trinity Brewing company 

Garage Grade - 4 and a half bottle caps out of 5 

Our show - True Crime Garage “Off the Record” is available only on Stitcher Premium. For a FREE month of listening go to http://stitcherpremium.com/truecrimegarage and use promo code GARAGE
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (Nic Edwards)
